segment.source: AppLocker helps you control which apps and files users can run.
segment.target: AppLocker helps you control which apps and files users can run.

segment.source: These include executable files, scripts, Windows Installer files, dynamic-link libraries (DLLs), packaged apps, and packaged app installers.
segment.target: These include executable files, scripts, Windows Installer files, dynamic-link libraries (DLLs), packaged apps, and packaged app installers.

segment.source: AppLocker helps you control which apps and files users can run.
segment.target: AppLocker helps you control which apps and files users can run.

segment.source: These include executable files, scripts, Windows Installer files, dynamic-link libraries (DLLs), packaged apps, and packaged app installers.
segment.target: These include executable files, scripts, Windows Installer files, dynamic-link libraries (DLLs), packaged apps, and packaged app installers.

segment.source: In Windows 10, AppLocker has added some improvements.
segment.target: In Windows 10, AppLocker has added some improvements.

segment.source: A new parameter was added to the New-AppLockerPolicy Windows PowerShell cmdlet that lets you choose whether executable and DLL rule collections apply to non-interactive processes.
segment.target: A new parameter was added to the New-AppLockerPolicy Windows PowerShell cmdlet that lets you choose whether executable and DLL rule collections apply to non-interactive processes.

segment.source: To enable this, set the ServiceEnforcement to Enabled.
segment.target: To enable this, set the ServiceEnforcement to Enabled.

segment.source: A new AppLocker configuration service provider was add to allow you to enable AppLocker rules by using an MDM server.
segment.target: A new AppLocker configuration service provider was add to allow you to enable AppLocker rules by using an MDM server.

segment.source: You can manage Windows 10 Mobile devices by using the new AppLocker CSP.
segment.target: You can manage Windows 10 Mobile devices by using the new AppLocker CSP.

segment.source: Learn how to manage AppLocker within your organization.
segment.target: Learn how to manage AppLocker within your organization.
